CHAT.comment: Playing kissing and making funny noises.
Baby is playing with a toy.
Long period of not talking with radio on.
Mother makes pie. Long periods of just radio playing.
Mother and father speak to each other.
Mother says to father "It wasn't as raised as that before."
Mum and Dad talk to each other. Baby starts to fret.
Mother calls the cats. Baby starts to fret.
Mother talks to father. Father talks to cat.
Father and baby are in the garden.
Dad sings to baby and growls at baby in playful way.
Mother and Father talk to each other.
Sylvester is a cat? Mother starts to talk to it.
Unintelligible. , Mother and Father talk to each other and baby starts to cry.
Baby is being fed and Mum and Dad are talking to each other.
One of the cats is naughty and the parents both scold it.
Mother and father talk to each other and to the cat.
Mother talks to father and to cat.
Baby sleeps and wakes up later and starts to fret.
They go in and the TV is on.
